p: Fresh huPBMC (2 × 10 7 cells) were labeled with 5 μM carboxyfluorescein succinimidyl ester (CFSE; Sigma-Aldrich) and then cultured as described previously to generate PAM-expanded Vγ9Vδ2-T cells. A neutralizing anti-CD137 mAb (5 μg/ml) was added to block the CD137-mediated signaling pathway, and mouse IgG1 (5 μg/ml) was used as an isotype control. On day 7, the profile of CFSE in CD3 +Vγ9 + cells was detected by flow cytometry.
